mapper.select: select p_f.name as process_definition_name, p_f.desc as `desc`, p.name as project_name,u.user_name,s.* from t_escheduler_schedules s join t_escheduler_process_definition p_f on s.process_definition_id = p_f.id join t_escheduler_project as p on p_f.project_id = p.id join t_escheduler_user as u on s.user_id = u.id where p.name = #{projectName}
select * from t_escheduler_schedules where process_definition_id in (#{processDefineIds}) and release_state = 1
